news.text: Added list of K2-hamiltonian snarks to the meta-directory.
Added list of 3-connected planar self-dual graphs to the meta-directory.
Added list of minimal Cayley graphs to the meta-directory.
It is now possible to search for a graph with a given graph6 string (rather than having to upload it from a file).
Added list of perihamiltonian graphs to the meta-directory.
Added list of snarks with minimal circular flow number to the meta-directory.
Added list of regular nut graphs to the meta-directory.
Added list of permutation snarks to the meta-directory.
Added list of cographs to the meta-directory.
Added list of uniquely hamiltonian graphs to the meta-directory.
Added list of snarks with oddness 4 to the meta-directory.
Added support to search for a graph with a specific HoG graph id.
Added the invariants circumference, density and planar.
It is now possible to view the 10 most recently added graphs.
Added list of snarks with circular flow number 5 to the meta-directory.
Added list of triangle-free k-chromatic graphs to the meta-directory.
Added list of platypus graphs to the meta-directory.
Added list of nut graphs to the meta-directory.
